description:
Step into the enchanting world of Wildmoon, where adventure awaits at every turn. Choose your destiny as a powerful Warrior, cunning Rogue, or mystical Mage. Traverse untamed lands, confront formidable creatures, and protect your town while unraveling hidden mysteries. Master the art of battle by matching sets of 3 or more gems to unleash devastating attacks on your enemies!

GAME FEATURES

● Over 100 Stages: Experience countless hours of gameplay with thousands of unique puzzle combinations.
● Diverse Enemies: Face off against 69 different forms of deadly creatures, each with their own challenges.
● Legendary Arsenal: Arm yourself with 13 coveted weapons and gear to enhance your hero’s prowess.
● Skill Mastery: Discover 61 unique skills for players and enemies, allowing for strategic depth and variety.
● Vast World: Explore an enormous map teeming with secrets, treasures, and adventures.
● Arena Mode: Compete in the arena to collect valuable loot and prove your dominance.

Are you ready to become a hero?
name: Jewel Fight: Heroes of Legend
